website_summaries.verdict: This moderately priced option is lightweight, waterproof, and effective for a variety of animals.
pros: Features include an indicator light and sealed, waterproof case
A great size for gardens and similar uses
Has a 2 year warranty that covers lightning damage
cons: Some complaints that this charger died within a year

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install even for the uninitiated
customer_reviews.text: Deer were eating everything in my backyard. The fence powered by this charger has changed the game. Used scent lures to add to the deterrent. The day I hooked it up it was putting out 7000+ volts my gauge went no higher. I put it outdoors in a plastic storage container and I can see the indicator light from my kitchen. It’s in an urban area so I have it on a dusk to dawn timer. Never installed one before but if you have basic DIY knowledge and can drive several 8’ ground rods you can also control your pests.
customer_reviews.author: DWH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fenced off garden area and this unit works perfectly. Mainly to keep medium to large dog out of vegetable garden. After one day the dog will not go close to wire fence. Tried touching wire and got a really good jolt.
customer_reviews.author: Keleka

customer_reviews.title: Worked Less Than 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all with this product. Didn't work more than 6 months. Was subjected to weather but it should have lasted longer than it did. Warranty is not easy to use. Bummed because it was not cheap. Will not be purchasing again. Disappointed because we really needed it to work to keep the electric fence charged for our animals to stay in their area & safe.
customer_reviews.author: Distinctivus Diva

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was having a serious problem with my dogs trying to climb my fence and going crazy when other dogs were close. This quickly corrected their behavior without causing them serious harm. I agonized for a couple of years over doing something like this because I love my dogs, but the risk of them escaping my fence and getting run over or having a problem with another dog was terrifying. After only a few days of electrifying the fence, they stayed clear of it and quickly lost interest in any people or animals who were beyond my fence. It’s the best thing I ever did and I wish I had done it much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smathers

customer_reviews.title: Effective bear stopper!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to keep the animals out, not in! In Alaska every fall bears forage for food aggressively. Sometimes this means just trying to eat the duck food, some times it means our ducks. This fence has kept every bear that approached our duck pen from entering.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Capable of producing a half inch arc of pain
customer_reviews.text: The opossum trying to kill my quail had no clue what hit it. The bear didn't either
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Great for stubborn pit bulls
customer_reviews.text: I have a pit bull pushed through bottom of chain link fence so installed electric fence along bottom put this box on it and he gets shocked hard enough to remember it for a week. However this box would be overkill prolly for a small dog. It does shock pretty hard. But keeps him from getting out. Greatest electric fence box ive purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Coreybuzzard2014

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I like the pulse instead of a constant ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like the pulse instead of a constant flow that this has. Our cat want step through it again. Looked like a lightining bug on its tail when it touched it. Also looked like a deer tried to step through the 4th and 5th strand because the 4th was wrapped around the 5th strand but no foot prints in the garden. Working good a month later!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Bears Out!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered to keep Bears out of the bee hives. The Bears are out and passing close by but have not bothered them! It works!! I researched several kinds and this was chosen because of price, value and voltage. It was put under a plastic hood, not sure how waterproof it is. The directions were comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't faze rabbits........... Works for humans!
customer_reviews.text: The product is well built. It gave my husband a nice jolt when he tried it...... after watching rabbit after rabbit run right under it, with no problems. If you want to keep rabbits away, do not buy this. If you want to keep large animals at bay, it may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bear & Raven

customer_reviews.title: Works. Make sure grass don’t touch wire.
customer_reviews.text: Good and effective. Just make sure to run one ground rod or two short ground rods or pipes. Also cut the grass around the wires to stay effective. Saved us from repeated dog escapes and unnecessary drama. Hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up, when we had to replace our old charger. Working great!
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Good product I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my 4 acre property. I used it to keep my dogs in and other animals out. I've got the wire a few times and have been shocked. It is just perfect to get you to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Denham

customer_reviews.title: reliable! and strong zapp!
customer_reviews.text: paid for itself the first weekend! stopped the 350 lb pigs from getting out into the neighbors yard (a $300 fine per pig by animal control ouch!) a big load off my mind to have the animals reliably contained. they may have squealed when zapped but there was no damage to their skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Good protector of my garden
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to protect my garden the first season. Simple to use and love the flashing light so I can tell if it's on. Also great that this is sealed and water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Slade

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at stopping deer from eating my newly planted shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: San Juan Guy

customer_reviews.title: warranty
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with 2 year wearranty but di not receive any paperwork for the warranty . Is the purchase enough to cover for the warranty . I called the Texas office and the girl advised that an email with the documents will be sent . Still have not received any emails .?????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely keep bears away!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works exactly as we hoped. That bear will not be back!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is not strong, my dogs touch it with nose and weak signal , it is not doing what it says , I am a master electrician and it doesn’t meet any electrical spects
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Pontifes

customer_reviews.title: Good product; easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Getting the first tomatoes from my garden in two years. Works very well; doesn't harm the animals but my garden now has some respect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used for my pig area (about an acre) works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and to see it's still working. Checked the voltage output at the box and on my fence line and it was doing its job! Only reason I didn't give 5 stars was it would be nice for it to have an on/off switch like my old one did...makes it easier when I turn it on and off every night and morning
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

product_meta.title: Patriot PMX120 Electric Fence Energizer, 1.2 Joule
product_meta.description: The Patriot PMX120 electric fence energizer is a 110 volt a/c plug in 1.2joule model suited for farms with small numbers of livestock.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
